summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1502, for the improvement of Twentieth Avenue North, from East Harrison Street to East Roy Street; East Mercer Street, from Nineteenth Avenue North to Twenty-first Avenue North; and East Republican Street, from Nineteenth Avenue North to Twenty-first Avenue North, all in the City of Seattle, by grading the same, and constructing wooden curbs and gutters and concrete sidewalks, and by constructing sewers of proper dimensions and materials, and water mains, together with all necessary appurtenances, under Ordinance No. 16011, and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
